title: Italian Union of Bank, Insurance and Tax Workers
text:
The UIL Credito Esattorie e Assicurazioni or UILCA is an Italian banks insurances and tax collectors workers' <a href="trade%20union">trade union</a> affiliated to the <a href="Italian%20Labour%20Union">Italian Labour Union</a> (UIL).
History.
UILCA was born in January 1998 from the merge of two trade unions affiliated to UIL: "Unione Italiana Bancari" ("UIB") and "UIL Assicurazioni" ("UILASS"). In April 2000 also the "Federazione Italiana Lavoratori Esattoriali" ("FILE") joined the union.
Affiliations.
It is a member of <a href="UNI%20Global%20Union">UNI Global Union</a>.
Members.
Last data available referred to year 2011 and indicate 43.957 members geographically distributed as follows:24.862 north <a href="Italy">Italy</a>, 10.067 center Italy and 9.028 southern Italy.
When a member retires became member of UIL Pensionati.
